Newborn infant ( enrollment age 0-14 day ) assign randomly receive one two product , provide identical package except lid color . Neither investigators parent know product infant receiving . The infant monitor study enrollment , 4 , 8 , 12 week age . There two study group , receive one follow formula : 1 . The new partially hydrolyze whey formula ( NF ) - Materna cow 's milk infant formula contain partially hydrolyze whey protein , produce package Materna Laboratories , Maabarot . 2 . The currently market partially hydrolyze whey formula ( CF ) - Nan HA , produce Nestlé . In order maintain blinding , Nan HA repacked package identical Materna product , except lid color
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Infant Formula With Partially Hydrolized Whey
DOC.detailed_description: The study randomize , double-blind , prospective trial . Newborn infant ( enrollment age 0-14 day ) assign randomly receive one two product , provide identical package except lid color . Neither investigators parent know product infant receiving . The infant monitor study enrollment , 4 , 8 , 12 week age . There two study group , receive one follow formula : 1 . The new partially hydrolyze whey formula ( NF ) - Materna cow 's milk infant formula contain partially hydrolyze whey protein , produce package Materna Laboratories , Maabarot . 2 . The currently market partially hydrolyze whey formula ( CF ) - Nan HA , produce Nestlé . In order maintain blinding , Nan HA repacked package identical Materna product , except lid color
DOC.criteria: Healthy term neonate whose mother able choose breastfeed medical , social , personal reason , recruit Twins Premature low birth weight ( < 2500 g ) . Chromosomal abnormality congenital malformation . Jaundice 12 mg % and/or phototherapy . Treatment antibiotic drug last three day prior commencement study .
DOC.keyword: infant formula , milk allergy , hydrolize whey
